general.gigTitle: develop wordpress business website, professional website

sellerCard.description: A graduate software Engineer and a full-time freelancer. Completed 300+ WordPress Websites for local as well as international clients. 4years+ Experience of Working with Clients around the world as a WordPress Developer.

description.content:
Looking for a professional and responsive WordPress website? No matter you are a small business or a corporate or even if you are looking for a personal/portfolio website. I am a WordPress Developer with 3 years+ experience.


I will provide you a Professional WordPress Website that stands out and meet your satisfaction.


Services Include:


  • Full Website Creation
  • 100% Responsive
  • Optimized for Speed
  • High-Quality Images
  • Development as per your requirements from scratch
  • Best Practices used to ensure Security
  • Fancy Sliders
  • Contact Forms, Social Media, Google Maps, Newsletter Subscription & Mailing list


Tutorial to use Website & After-sales Support


Looking forward to hear from you. Feel free to leave a message together we can take your professional and responsive WordPress Design to the next level.



Note I am not taking orders for any Site having Adult Content

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will I get a 100% Responsive WordPress Website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I can guarantee that your website will be fully responsive.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What will you require to get work started?
questionsAndAnswers.answer:
You would be required to provide me hosting and domain Logins. If you need assistance regarding them feel free to contact me. 
Content of the website would be required which you can also provide during order.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you provide Hosting for WordPress Website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: No, I do not provide Hosting.

questionsAndAnswers.question: How many revisions are included
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Revisions to Satisfaction is what I promise. Unless there is no additional work we promise revisions till satisfaction.

packageList.title: Basic

openGraph.title: develop wordpress business website, professional website

reviews.comment: This project originally started from Oct 19 2024 and finally delivered uncompleted in Jan 2025. The freelancer was manipulative and made two attempts to knowingly deliver the project incomplete, the second time during the Xmas period, and refused to complete the rest of the project. I gave very detailed instructions each time and recorded Loom videos, however, his response time was exceptionally long and he simply ignored many of my instructions. He went ahead without heeding them and never explained why, such that on the same issues, I had to bring them up several time before he started to fix them. On the other hand, he had asked me to fully trust him 100% and pay him first and then receive the project fully delivered. I was tricked into believing him and agreed to pay him 60%. Guess what after I paid, he refused to work out the rest of the project! A bad experienc.

seller_response.comment:
Never ever work with her. 
She asked Support to cancel my order without even letting me know.
When support cancel she wanted to start a new order I asked her give me written requirements she refused to give me. 
I informed support they asked me to block her. 
So she posted this review.

reviews.comment: was amazing, and the website had everything i asked. I am very impressed and will be recommending everyone to come here. will also be using again! thankyou
Hamza is very good at what he does! he designed a very nice blog website as requested, delivered on time and also done some post delivery modifications.
Hamza doesn't mess around. He takes your input and gets you going quickly.

2- Saves you Time
3- Saves any extra costs
4- Provides you with ideas on how you can grow your business.
